seo.title: Positano vs inne kurorty plażowe: porównanie kosztów
seo.description: Porównanie cen noclegów, jedzenia i transportu z innymi popularnymi celami nadmorskimi.

linkLabel: Positano vs inne kurorty plażowe: porównanie kosztów

sections.title: Transport & experiences
body: Ferries run €9–€22, slightly higher than Croatia but cheaper than Greek island water taxis.

a: Yes if you prioritise cliffside views, iconic beaches, and quick ferry links. You can trim costs by staying nearby and focusing spend on standout meals or tours.

faqs.q: Where should I go if I want similar views for less?

when.heading: When it’s good value
when.body: Shoulder season, weekdays, and longer stays near Chiesa Nuova reduce costs and effort.

faq.summary: Is Positano more expensive than Amalfi?
faq.answer: Often for seafront stays; value improves inland or near bus stops.
